ygData.subject: Re: Race diference?
ygData.msgSnippet: to be honest, i like my dark elf.  starting agility is highest out of gnome/high elf/erudite (i think agility should be second most important stat rather than
ygData.messageBody:
to be honest, i like my dark elf. starting agility is highest out of
gnome/high elf/erudite (i think agility should be second most important stat
rather than stamina), and int second only to erudite. im also finding that
the KOS part about dark races is not an issue. most of the areas i frequent
do not have KOS guards and such (so i cant go in the cities, big deal... i
have teleport to nektulos anyway). but i think all 4 (gnome/dark elf/high
elf/erudite) are good choices. all are pretty well suited with the high
int, which is what is really important. i think with a human, you'll be
sacrificing a little at higher lvls (because of the low int), but if thats
what you want to play, than more power to u :)

Sinlaru Ce`alen
Rallos Zek

-----Original Message-----
From: Wizard <wizard@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 3:36 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Race diference?


>From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
>
>as for some time now im wondering about race diferences and balance. Im a
>high elf wizard starting with a 127 int and i build my int until now to 150
>so i have same mana as erudite wizard start with ( a little bit more) i
>have seen that this little mana for my lavel it is not so little it is my
>higest spell ! and some roots more it makes a life much easier i noted i
>can now survive fight against a white monster easyly and blu ones if alone
>are no fear for me any more. and i remain with a little bit of mana to
>invis myself end meditate ehehe.
>
>I wished to ask anyone of you who gets in medium lv 20+ range with both
>races and clases what are advantages of a high elf wich can cover this huge
>diference in mana.
>
>Infravision is not a big one you get a heat sight at lv 16.
>Wisdom ? did elfs realy fizzle so much less then others? i dont think so.
>to compensate a diference in mana they have to have ratio of fizles 3 elf
>to 4 erudites.
>Agility? i get missed many times it is true is this same to erudite?
>Possibility to wear smal items is null for wizards.
>
>Humans are compensated very well with their ability to level faster.
>Dark elf are excelent with a hide ability to med in middle of fight but
>they are easyly KOS.
>
>what you think about other races?
>
>Please i dont wish to talk about "roleplay your race" thing and similar i
>chose my elf as i like him as a race and i know that a races are somehow
>balanced i wish to know this balance works on our wizard example.
>
>Thanks,
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
